about_the_game:
"Mecha Force" is a VR mecha action game. Pilot the gigantic KYLIN in a chaotic future and face the Dominators, the ultimate threat to humanity. The fate of the world depends on your skills as a mecha pilot!

Maki will serve as your navigator, control the steel giant KYLIN and fight to reclaim the future of humanity.

"Mecha Force" Features

Total Fusion with Mecha Action in the Union System
Feel one with the giant robot as you climb into the cockpit and face the Dominators.

Unlimited Customization Options for Your Robot
Use the multiple options to customize your KYLIN mecha to your hearts desire.

Epic Battles in a Roguelike System with Random Maps
Explore the game's roguelike system, complete with random maps that expand gameplay possibilities.

NeutralLink-Navigator
The mysterious Machineera (Maki) can connect with KYLIN through the Neutral Link. She will accompany you in battles, helping you as your navigator.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-6700
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 3060/AMD Radeon RX 6700XT series or higher
  • VR Support: Meta Quest 3、Meta Quest 2、Valve Index HMD
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Hop into the cockpit of a giant mecha in this VR experience. Fuse intense robot action and roguelike mechanics as you create your own unique mecha for battle!
supported_languages:
English*, Japanese, Simplified Chinese*
